name: Cloud Atlas: Shift
description:
Fight through dungeons with your most trusted companion: yourself! Flip through timelines to utilize skills from different lifetimes as you fight your way through hordes of dastardly foes, spooky skeletons, and one big bad boss.

Inspired by Tom Hanks' mind-bending and time-consuming classic Cloud Atlas!

Created for Awful Jam's 2019 Hank Jam. Free to download and play!
